title: Exercise
description: Exercise by far has been proven to be one of the best natural solutions to depression or a depressed state. There is an undeniable rush of endorphins, dopamine, & seratonin that you feel after even moderate physical activity. Most of us just can't find the time fit in a long workout session into our routine. Follow this 10 minute at home workout to help alleviate some of your depression symptoms.

title: A Good Laugh
description: A silly and simple as it may seem, a good laugh can do wonders for uplifting your mood. Just the physical act of smiling alone has been shown to increase your mood. If you're in need of something to put a quick smile on your face and short on time watch this 10 minute video. Sure to help yu crack a smile.

title: Small Acts of Kindness
description: Depression by it's nature is an internally focused feeling, you often feel trapped inside your self. Sometimes the best cure is to turn your attention outward. A quick read through this study will show you that small acts of kindness, done consistently can help alleviate your depressive symptoms over the long term.
